title: Four pole/four pole changeover device
fullText:
When a four pole/four pole changeover device is used in a main switchboard, the normal supply neutral conductor to the switchboard shall not be switched prior to MEN link.
A four pole/four pole changeover device may be used to connect a generating set at a switchboard without a MEN link fitted (distribution switchboard).
Where a four pole/four pole changeover device is used, the incoming submain and generating set neutral conductors may be switched.
